thread.title: My Masters Is Paris-Roubaix

author: Jason Gay
title: My Masters Is Paris-Roubaix
text:
I know what you’re going to watch Sunday—like pretty much everyone else, you’ll be parked on the couch, sipping a tall Arnold Palmer, maybe an Arnold Palmer with a splash of something, listening to Jim Nantzypants rhapsodize from Augusta at the Masters.
That’s cool.
Me? I’m excited to watch hell. Specifically, Paris-Roubaix, aka the Hell...
